official-title.#text: To authorize the National Desert Storm Memorial Association to establish the National Desert Storm and Desert Shield Memorial as a commemorative work in the District of Columbia, and for other purposes.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text: National Desert Storm and Desert Shield War Memorial Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: National Desert Storm and Desert Shield War Memorial Act

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 501(a) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986

term.#tail: means the National Desert Storm Memorial Association, a corporation organized under the laws of the State of Arkansas and described in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: National Desert Storm and Desert Shield War Memorial Act/s:3

term.#tail: means the National Desert Storm and Desert Shield Memorial authorized to be established under

text.#text: The Association may establish the National Desert Storm and Desert Shield Memorial as a commemorative work, on Federal land in the District of Columbia to commemorate and honor those who, as a member of the Armed Forces, served on active duty in support of Operation Desert Storm or Operation Desert Shield.
The establishment of the commemorative work shall be in accordance with

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: chapter 89 of title 40, United States Code

header.#text: Compliance with standards for commemorative works act

text.#text: Federal funds may not be used to pay any expense of the establishment of the memorial. The Association shall be solely responsible for acceptance of contributions for, and payment of the expenses of, the establishment of the memorial.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: ), or upon expiration of the authority for the commemorative work under
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 8906(b)(1) of title 40, United States Code

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , there remains a balance of funds received for the establishment of the commemorative work, the Association shall transmit the amount of the balance to the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 8903(e) of title 40, United States Code

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: for deposit in the account provided for in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 8906(b)(3) of title 40, United States Code
